name: Camping Planner
description: Camping Planner application uses a series of technologies to create a functioning app that allows users to choose from a list of national parks and in turn get back a series of details about their trip location, add and create an equipment list and select certain parks as favorites to store and look back on later.

name: Fittness Tracker
description: Users are able to create and track daily workouts. Log multiple exercieses or workouts in a day.  track the name, type, weight, sets, reps, and duration of exercise. Track distance for cardio exercises.

name: Employee Directory
description: Allows users to view an employee directory and filter search by employee name.

name: BREWFINDER
description: BREWFINDER is a simple application that takes a users zipcode and returns a list of local breweries in their area.

name: Budget Tracker
description: Users are able to keep track of their budget withdrawls and deposits. This app also allows offline use; when returning online, offline enteries should be added to tracker.

name: Password Generator
description: Generates a random password for users based on answered promts.
